var quickSort = function(arr) {
ã€€ã€€if (arr.length <= 1) { return arr; }
ã€€ã€€var pivotIndex = Math.floor(arr.length / 2);
ã€€ã€€var pivot = arr.splice(pivotIndex, 1)[0];
ã€€ã€€var left = [];
ã€€ã€€var right = [];
ã€€ã€€for (var i = 0; i < arr.length; i++){
ã€€ã€€ã€€ã€€if (arr[i] < pivot) {
ã€€ã€€ã€€ã€€ã€€ã€€left.push(arr[i]);
ã€€ã€€ã€€ã€€} else {
ã€€ã€€ã€€ã€€ã€€ã€€right.push(arr[i]);
ã€€ã€€ã€€ã€€}
ã€€ã€€}
ã€€ã€€return quickSort(left).concat([pivot], quickSort(right));
};

}
return resArr;
}

interface Generator extends Iterator {
next(value?: any): IteratorResult;
throw(exception: any);
}
function* anotherGenerator(i) {
yield i + 1;
yield i + 2;
yield i + 3;
}

function generator(i) {
yield i;
yield anotherGenerator(i);
yield i + 10;
}

var gen = generator(10);

console.log(gen.next().value);
console.log(gen.next().value);
console.log(gen.next().value);
console.log(gen.next().value);
console.log(gen.next().value);

gen.next().value -> 10
gen.next().value -> 11
gen.next().value -> 12
gen.next().value -> 13
gen.next().value -> 20

function* list(value) {
for (var item of value) {
yield item;
}
}

for (var value of list([1, 2, 3])) {
console.log(value);
}

var iterator = list([1, 2, 3]);

console.log(typeof iterator.next); // function
console.log(typeof iterator[Symbol.iterator]); // function

console.log(iterator.next().value); // 1

for (var value of iterator) {
console.log(value); // 2, 3
}
table[Symbol.iterator] = function* () {
var keys = Object.keys(this).sort();

for (var item of keys) {
yield item;
}
}
